facts.seriesTitle: Population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line was approximately 0.7 % in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Employed population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 0.9 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line was approximately3.1 % in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2013, China has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 8.7 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely stunted (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2013, 8.1 % of children under 5 years of age had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely overweight
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under 5 years of age increased from 3.4 % in 2000 to 6.6% in 2010.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 97 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 27 per 100,000 live births in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under 5 years of age fell from 36.8 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 9.3 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 21.82 % in 2000 to 24.25% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed sanitation services (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 59.69 % of the population used a "safely managed" sanitation serviceâ€“a basic facility that safely disposes of human waste

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity was 100.0 % in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 58 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (percent)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita declined from 7.83 % in 2000 to 6.4% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 9.18 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 24.9 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kg per constant 2010 US dollars)
facts.fact_text: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP decreased from 0.68 kg in 2000 to 0.47 kg in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 2.11 % of GDP, up from 0.89 % in 2000

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 99.5 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of urban population living in slums (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the urban population living in slums declined from 43.6 % in 1990 to 25.2% in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameter (PM2.5) was about 49.16 micrograms per cubic metre. This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2013, China has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 9.18 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 24.9 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2013, China has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 5.41 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (percent)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest increased from 18.78 % in 2000 to 22.1% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 34.37 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 37.77 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population
facts.fact_text: In 2014, the intentional homicide rate was 0.73 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances as a proportion of total GCP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the inflow of personal remittances was 0.31 % of GDP, up from 0.05 % in 1990

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (percent)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services was approximately0.67 % in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 27.97 % of the population,nearly no coverage in 2000.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of national statistical plans that are fully funded
facts.fact_text: As of 2018, China has developed national statistical plans that are fully funded.
